description: Regular users can get a key for quick access to Santander Cycles

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["If you use Santander Cycles regularly and aren't already a registered user, why not sign up to make hiring bikes even quicker?"],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
Membership gives you faster, cost effective bike access, giving you more time to explore London. Benefits include:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Quicker access to the bikes with your own key","Save money with yearly access to the bikes for £90 - that's just 25p per day","Pay as you go costs £2 for 24 hour access plus any extra ride charges for journeys over 30 minutes"]}
It's easy to join - you can become a member using the Santander Cycles app, or by setting up an online account.

If you're 18 or over and studying in London, you can hire a Santander Cycle for a year for £67.50. To get your discount, log in to UNIDAYS . You'll receive an email with your code which you can use when you buy yearly membership .
The Santander Cycles app sends a release code direct to your smartphone, letting you skip past the terminal and get on your bike quicker. Find out more about the app .

Online membership gives you a handy monthly overview of your rides. Once you've taken 5 trips, we'll email you a monthly activity statement showing how far you've gone, total distance and calories burnt. You'll get a yearly activity report too. You can also:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Register for a key - get faster access to Santander Cycles by \u003ca href=\"https://santandercycles.tfl.gov.uk/Registration\"\u003eregistering for a cycle hire key\u003c/a\u003e . They cost a one-off fee of £3","Activate your key - shortly after you've registered for your key, you'll receive a welcome pack in the post. \u003ca href=\"https://santandercycles.tfl.gov.uk/\"\u003eWhen the key arrives, you can activate it online\u003c/a\u003e ","Order extra keys - if you want to ride with family and friends you can order extra keys when you sign up"]}
